data.front: Explain the concept of malnutrition by considering the most important information
back: A condition resulting from the lack of absorption or the lack of consumption of nutritional substances, leading to a change in body composition, physical and mental impairment of the bodyâ€™s function, and adversely affecting the outcome of treatment of the underlying disease

data.front: Patients who are seriously overweight or obese are most often accompanied by malnutrition of the Kwashiorkor type.
